id.comment: Set 1 - Test syntax of Pattern while (Positive/Negative tests). Pattern while syntax, LHS synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select v pattern w(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; assign a; Select w pattern w(a, _)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS Ident RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("mango", _)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("notalive", _)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w(_, _)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS Integer RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w(21, _)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: while w; variable v, v1; Select v pattern w(v, v1)

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS synonym RHS Ident

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select v pattern w(v, "black")

id.comment: Pattern while syntax, LHS synonym RHS Integer

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select w pattern w(v, 30)

id.comment: Set 2 - Pattern while at different nesting levels (Algorithmic Tests). Pattern while nesting, Not nested 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("j", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Not nested 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("two2", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Nested in if 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("red", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Nested in if 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("yes", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Nested in while 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("apple", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Nested in while 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("rainbow", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Multiple nested 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("black", _)

id.comment: Pattern while nesting, Multiple nested 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("rain", _)

id.comment: Set 3 - Relation tests for Pattern while (Algorithmic Tests). Relation, Select all while that has variable in condition

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select w pattern w(v, _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all variable that is in while condition

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select v pattern w(v, _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all while that has a specific variable in condition 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("j", _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all while that has a specific variable in condition 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("red", _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all while that has a specific variable in condition 3

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("fiction", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if condition but not while 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("y", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if condition but not while 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("blue", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in while condition but not if 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("mango", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in while condition but not if 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("cont", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if and while condition 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("one1", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if and while condition 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("fact", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not in if or while condition 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("num", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not in if or while condition 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("gone", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not nested and not in while condition 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("die", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not nested and not in while condition 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("end", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is nested but not in while condition 1

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("k", _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is nested but not in while condition 2

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("t", _)

id.comment: Set 4 - Boundary tests for Pattern while (Boundary tests). Boundary, Non-existent variable

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w("sos", _)
